General.Name: Salee Colour Public Company Limited
General.Description: Salee Colour Public Company Limited engages in manufacture and distribution of pigment pellets and powders, fabricated plastic, and solar energy system and parts in Thailand and internationally. The company offers black masterbatch products for use in engineering and polyolefin resins; white masterbatch products for applications in a range of carrier resins; and filler masterbatch products for use in polyolefin resins. It also provides additive masterbatch products, including anti-oxidants, anti-static, anti-microbial, fragrance, non-halogen flame retardant, processing aids, slip-agent, anti-block, UV stabilizers, etc. for application in the construction, textile and fiber, agriculture, food and industrial packaging, electronic appliance, automotive, and enhancing recycle article areas. In addition, the company offers custom color masterbatch products and bioplastic compounds, as well as compounding and laboratory testing services; and solar energy system installation services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: Bangpu Industrial Estate, Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10280
